column2: How old were you when you first started smoking cigarettes every day?
column9: Enter age in years.  Note to interviewer: Respondents who were classified as a "Current Every-Day Smoker" by answering the Tobacco - Smoking Status adult Question 1 as "Yes" (Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life?) and Question 2 as "Every day" (Do you now smoke cigarettes every day, some days, or not at all?) are asked.

column2: How old were you when you first started smoking cigarettes every day?
How old were you when you first started smoking cigarettes FAIRLY REGULARLY?
column9: Enter age in years.  Note to interviewer: Respondents who were classified as a "Current Some-Day Smoker" or "Former Smoker" (by answering the Tobacco - Smoking Status adult Question 1 as "Yes" (Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life?) and Question 2 (Do you now smoke cigarettes every day, some days, or not at all?) as "Some days" or "Not at all") AND answered Question 3 ( Have you EVER smoked cigarettes EVERY DAY for at least 6 months? ) as "Yes" are asked.

column2: How old were you when you first started smoking cigarettes FAIRLY REGULARLY?
